attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My 10yr old daughter Katie started a free range chicken campaign in hemel,and has already been in the local paper twice and has a display in our local mall.She has already got over 700 signitures but is still wanting more people to sign.So please help her by signing this one.Thanks for your support

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
